group.name: Bullet
group.string: Move an object ahead at its current angle. Typically used for bullets and projectiles.

group.name: properties
group.string: The speed, in pixels per second, the object travels at.
The rate of acceleration, in pixels per second per second. Negative values decelerate.
Gravity on the bullet, in pixels per second per second.
Make the object bounce off solid objects when it collides with them.
Set the object's angle to the angle of motion.

group.name: cnds
group.string: Compare the current speed of the object.
Choose the way to compare the current speed.
The speed, in pixels per second, to compare the current speed to.

group.name: acts
group.string: The new speed of the object to set, in pixels per second.
The new acceleration of the object to set, in pixels per second per second.
Set the object's force of gravity.
The new acceleration caused by gravity, in pixels per second per second.
Set {my} angle of motion to [i]{0}[/i] degrees
Set the angle the object is moving at.
The new angle of motion, in degrees.
Bounce the object off an object it is currently touching.
Set whether this behavior is enabled.
Set whether to enable or disable the behavior.

group.name: exps
group.string: The current object speed, in pixels per second.
The acceleration setting, in pixels per second per second.
The angle the object is currently moving at, in degrees.
